name: Undercover Roles
description: Techniques for assuming and maintaining covert identities in high-risk environments.

cards.title: Legend Building & Deep Cover
cards.description: Creating and maintaining a false identity to operate in hostile environments.
bulletpoints: Develop comprehensive backstories and personal narratives
Memorize details of cover identities and supporting documentation
Adapt speech patterns and behaviors to match target demographics
cards.summaryText: Craft airtight legends, internalize every detail, and mirror local mannerisms to survive deep cover deployments.

cards.title: Social Infiltration & Manipulation
cards.description: Gaining access to restricted environments through social engineering techniques.
bulletpoints: Utilize pretexting to gain trust within target organizations
Develop rapport-building techniques for intelligence gathering
Avoid common pitfalls that could compromise undercover roles
cards.summaryText: Blend pretexting with rapid rapport tactics while steering clear of tells that would blow your undercover access.
